findings.Description: RDS instances should not be publicly accessible to minimize security risks.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: RDS DB instance has public accessibility enabled

findings.Description: Lambda functions should be configured with a dead-letter queue for failed invocations.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS-Foundational-Security-Best-Practices
findings.Title: Lambda function is not configured with a dead-letter queue

findings.Description: AWS Config detected configuration drift on 12 resources that deviate from approved baseline configuration.
Types: Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards
findings.Title: Resource configuration drift detected
